title: Sandstorm Released!
author: TJ
text: The new Sandstorm vehicle is now available in the store!

title: Hammerhead Released!
author: TJ
text: A new heavy-hitter, the Hammerhead, joins the lineup.

title: New Weapons!
author: TJ
text: Check out the two new rifles added in today's patch.

title: Trick System
author: TJ
text: Get air and show off your skills with the new in-game trick system.
